price: 21. Mise waxaan siinnay Kitaab ka horreeyey (Qur’aanka oo amri inay caabudaan Alle qeyrki) oo ay heystaan?
arabic: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikūna
